sn56.96-101:1.1: “… the sentient beings who refrain from mutilation, murder, abduction, banditry, plunder, and violence are few, while those who don’t refrain are many.
sn56.96-101:1.3: It’s because they haven’t seen the four noble truths.
sn56.96-101:1.5: The noble truths of suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
sn56.96-101:2.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
